member.name: T:Sudoku.UI.Resources.UiResources
member.summary: Provides the methods that handles with resource dictionary.

member.name: F:Sudoku.UI.Resources.UiResources.Current
member.summary: Gets the default handler that interacts with resource dictionary.

remarks.para:
This is a instance, which means you can get anything you want using the following code style to get the items in this class:
Current.PropertyName (Property invokes)
Current[PropertyIndex] (Indexer invokes)
For example, if you want to get the value from the key "Bug", now you may write Current.Bug or Current["Bug"] to get that value.
